interpretation.test2_problem: Null model saturated - ANY random 412-element MIDDLE set achieves 100% containment. Test meaningless.
interpretation.test3_finding: Length-matched null achieves 99.0% containment. Real PP (100%) is only z=1.08 above baseline. NOT significant.
interpretation.conclusion: PP-as-atoms observation is likely a statistical artifact of short MIDDLEs naturally appearing as substrings in longer strings. The pattern is NOT specific to PP vocabulary.
